Award.AwardTitle: CLEANER: Collaborative Research: Collaborative Large-Scale Engineering Analysis Network for Environmental Research for the Coastal Margin

Division.LongName: Div Of Chem, Bioeng, Env, & Transp Sys

Award.AbstractNarration: 0414462 Bonner The goal of this planning proposal is to create an integrated, collaborative framework for coastal margings resreach addressing the four US costal margins, including Atlantic and Pacific Oceans, Gulf of Mexico, and Laurentian Great Lakes. The envisioned network will support data collection, data aggregation, analytical tools for visualization and exploratory data mining, and a computational environment supporting predictive modeling capabilities.
